content: **knitted hot water bottle cover in drops alpaca bouclé and drops melody the piece is worked bottom up in stocking stitch theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ab-142 yarn group c + d ------------------------------------------------------- **size** fits a water bottle of 32 cm in length and 19 cm in width **yarn** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 0100 off white and use drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 50 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 7 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm **knitting gauge** 12 stitches in width and 16 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
